item.title: APSB25-93: APSB25-93: Security update available for Adobe ColdFusion
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates. More details in the security bulletin.
Products: Adobe ColdFusion Severity: Important
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb25-93.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
